phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
came into the limelight.
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
The YOU.A. sports festival is drawing near.
Joining a famous hero agency will get you more experience and popularity.
The YOU.A. sports festival is something pro heroes-
no, the whole country-is watching closely.
A big event!
That is what I brought you here to talk about!
The next All Might... the fledgling Symbol of Peace...
Izuku Midoriya.
I want you to tell the world I am here!
The sports festival first-year stage qualifier,
an obstacle course race!
Who could have predicted the developments at the beginning or this conclusion?
Right now, the first person back in the stadium is that man...
Izuku Midoriya's made a huge splash!
The second round of the YOU.A. sports festival first-year stage is...
A cavalry battle with the top 42 from the qualifier!
Those at the top will suffer more.
You will hear this many times as you attend YOU.A.
This is what Plus Ultra means!
Izuku Midoriya, who placed first in the qualifier, is worth ten million points!
What the hell can you do?
You are Quirkless!
The eyes around me are different from junior high...
The top spot I got for an instant because of luck...
Even so...
You are quick to understand, huh, young man?
Even so,
is it really this heavy, All Might?
Strategy, Strategy, Strategy
Now then, I will explain the rules of the cavalry battle.
The time limit is fifteen minutes.
Each team is worth the total of its members' points,
and the riders will wear a headband with that number on their foreheads.
Teams will try to grab each other's headbands until time runs out,
and try to keep as many points as they can.
Velcro Made to be taken off easily
Stolen headbands must be worn from the neck up.
So the more you steal, the harder it will be to manage them!
And the most important thing is that even if your headband gets stolen,
or if your team falls, you are not out!
Which means...
on the field the whole time?
That is tough.
One strategy could be to let someone take your points first so you will be more free.
It is hard to say without seeing how all the points end up getting split up, Mina.
During the game, it will be a cruel fight where you can use your Quirks.
But it is still a cavalry battle.
You will get a red card for attacks that are trying to make people fall on purpose!
You will be removed immediately!
Damn.
Now, you have fifteen minutes to build your teams.
Start!
Fifteen minutes?
-Points do not really matter in my case.
-Hey, be on my team.
-Points do not really matter in my case.
-Someone in the top ten, pick me.
The people I want on my team are...
The YOU.A. sports festival is more about simulating the competition they will face as heroes
than seeing how prepared they are to be heroes.
Huh?
What are you talking about?
In a world crowded with hero agencies, in order to put food on the table,
there are times when you have to kick down others in order to show your stuff.
That was what the obstacle course race in the qualifier was, right?
Does not that just pain your heart?
You little-
You did that quite gleefully, remember?
On the other hand,
even if you are business rivals, there are many cases where you have to work together.
Oh, that is just like the cavalry battle!
If you win, your teammates also win.
You have to think about compatibility and other people's Quirks...
It is a give-and-take situation...
Coordinating with your sidekick,
and joint Quirk training with other agencies...
The kids are doing stuff now that will be their way of life after they become pros.
They have got it rough.
Team up with me!
What?
Bakugo, team up with me!
Do not you want to team up with me?
I do not know what Quirks you all have!
What?!
I can understand not knowing Class B's, but-
He does not pay attention to what is around him at all, huh?
Even though his personality's like that, he still came in third and has two hundred points.
Considering the all-purpose use of his Quirk, it makes sense that he is popular.
Hey!
Todoroki chose his team already!
Bakugo, team up with me!
Weird Hair.
I am Kirishima!
At least try to remember!
My hair's not that different from yours!
You are going to be the rider, right?
Then who will be a front horse that can take your blasts?
Here
Someone with guts.
Not really, but yeah!
Me, with my Hardening!
I will be a horse that will never waver!
You are going to get it, right?
The ten million?
Shoji...
Shoji...!
I wanted to team up with a girl, but it is no good!
Please team up with me!
I am tiny, so I cannot be a horse!
But no one'll be my horse if I am the rider!
With your huge body and tentacles,
you could cover my whole body, cannot you?
Right?
Right?
That is a great idea, Mineta.
As expected, people are teaming up with their classmates, huh?
Since no one has a good grasp of what Quirks those in the other classes have.
I need to do something quick, too...
Isolated
Um, Ojiro...?
Sorry...
As I thought, no one wants to try to keep the points for the whole game.
It would be a better strategy to try to steal the points at the end.
And unlike Todoroki or Kacchan, I did not use my Quirk,
confidence confidence confidence confidence
so no one has any confidence in me...
Deku!
Let us be a team!
Uraraka!
I-Is it really okay?
Everyone'll probably be after me because of my ten million points!
If we run away the whole time, then you will win, right?
I-I think you are overestimating me, Uraraka...
Like I would!
Anyway, it is better to team up with people you get along with!
Heart-squeeze
What is the matter?
You look ugly, you know.
Oh, nothing...
It is just that you are so bright that I cannot look straight at you...
Actually, I wanted to team up with you, too.
Thanks!
Urine...?
For teams, it is best to be with people you can communicate with smoothly, right?
Yup, yup!
Actually, with your Quirk and one other person...
Iida.
The three of us would be horses with Iida in the front!
And then, if we use Uraraka's Quirk to make Iida and me lighter,
we would be able to maneuver easily.
I see!
It is better to have someone physically strong as the rider,
but I have not decided who...
Anyway, this is all I could think of to keep running away until the end...
I expected no less, Midoriya...
But I am afraid I have to refuse.
Ever since the entrance exam, I just keep losing to you.
You are a wonderful friend,
but that is why, if I just keep following you, I will never grow.
Bakugo and Todoroki are not the only ones who see you as a rival.
I will challenge you.
Iida...
It is already begun.
Everyone is an enemy.
That is right.
I am at the top right now.
I cannot just play at being friends.
As I thought, this is great.
You stand out!
Team up with me, person in first place!
Ahh, so close!
Who are you?!
I am Mei Hatsume, from the support course!
Oh, that weird person from back then.
I do not know you, but let me use your position!
She is honest!
If I team up with you,
then I will inevitably become part of the team everyone is watching most, right?
If that happens, then my super cute babies will inevitably be seen
by the big companies.
That means, in other words, that those big companies will see my babies!
W-Wait a minute.
Babies and big companies?
What are you-
-And, I think you guys will also benefit.
-Oh, she is not interested in me...
The support course develops equipment that helps heroes deal with their Quirks.
I have a ton of babies, so I am sure you will be able to find one that you like!
Oh, has this one caught your eye?
I made this based on a certain hero's backpack, adding my own original twist to it.
Could you be talking about the Buster Hero, Air Jet?
I like him, too!
Really?
Yeah, his agency's close, so I went to tour it before.
-I see.
They are already getting along.
-By the way, my Quirk is...
Not being able to team up with Iida was a blow,
but with Hatsume and Uraraka...
I just need one more person.
It looks like everyone is pretty set on their teams already, huh?
No, that is fine.
The power our team's missing...
The one who can fill that spot is...
Deku?
Almost everyone here has their eyes on Class A.
Why is that?
And like Tetsutetsu said, Class A is full of themselves about it...
It is strange, is not it?
The only difference between us and them is that they fought villains.
Why were those of us in Class B happy with being in the middle of the pack?
Let us let that arrogant Class A know, guys.
Now then, it is about time to get started!
Come on, wake up, Eraser!
After fifteen minutes to form teams and talk strategy,
twelve cavalry teams are lined up on the field!
There are some interesting teams out there.
Now, raise those battle cries!
It is time for YOU.
A.'s bloody battle!
Light the signal fire!
Yes!
Uraraka.
Yes!
Hatsume.
Tokoyami.
Yeah.
I am counting on you!
I chose you three because I thought it would be the most stable formation.
Kaminari, you will be the left wing, keeping the enemy away with your electricity.
Yaoyorozu, you will be the right wing.
You are in charge of insulation and assisting with defense and movement.
Iida, you will be in front as the main source of mobility and physical defense.
So you will attack and create diversions with ice and fire, then, Todoroki?
No.
In battle...
My heart's pounding!!
All right!
You have made your teams, right?
I am not going to ask if you are ready or not!
Tetsutetsu.
No hard feelings, okay?
Yeah!
Now, let us go!
Counting down to the brutal battle royal!
Three!
We are aiming for...
Two!
One!
Start!
It is basically a battle for the ten million points!
Midoriya, I will take that!
An attack without delay, huh...
The fate of the pursued...
Fate...
Make your choice, Midoriya!
Choice...!
Of course, our move is to run away!
I will not let you!
What is this?
We are sinking?!
That person's Quirk, huh?
All right!
It is no good...
I cannot get out!
Uraraka!
Hatsume!
Turn your faces away!
He flew?
Thanks to the support course, huh?
Follow them!
Jiro!
I know!
Tokoyami!
Good!
Dark Shadow, keep watch over our blind spots!
Got it!
Wow, that is so cool!
The defense that we were lacking...
You are more than making up for it with your omnidirectional mid-range defense!
That is amazing, Tokoyami!
You are the one who chose me.
We are landing.
Making everyone other than Uraraka weightless,
so our weight is just Uraraka plus the equipment and clothes.
What do you think of my babies?
Are not they cute?
Cuteness can be made, you know.
Excellent mobility!
The babies are amazing, Hatsume!
Right?
It is because I am making them float...
We are going after them, too!
Come on, Jiro, time to get revenge!
Hey, wait, Hagakure!
Your headband's gone!
When did that happen?!
Profiting while others fight.
Now then, even though barely two minutes have passed since we have started,
It is already turned into a free-for-all!
Fights over the headbands breaking out all over!
Ignoring the ten million points and going for second to fourth places is not bad, either!
Fighting?
No, this is...
Shoji?
What?
By himself?
But it is a team battle!
Let us put some space between us for now.
We cannot be caught standing still against multiple opponents!
What?
What is wrong, Uraraka?
I am stuck!
That is Mineta's...
Where did it come from?
From here... Midoriya...
What?
Is that allowed?
It is!
I did not expect any less from you, Midoriya.
Asui, too?
That is amazing, Shoji!
Call me Tsu!
Team Mineta makes use of the overwhelming difference in their sizes!
They are like a tank!
Midoriya, get away!
My baby was torn apart!
Sorry!
But we got away!
Kacchan!
Do not get carried away!
Damn it!
Tokoyami!
-He is gotten separated from his horses!
-What is with this guy?
Is that okay?!
Nice catch!
It is a technicality, so it is okay!
It would not have been if he would touched the ground, though!
Thanks, Uraraka!
It is hard to control with just one foot.
Yeah, I know.
Landing like this is inefficient...
We cannot run to the air anymore.
We will have to survive this with our increased mobility from Uraraka's Zero Gravity
and with Tokoyami's Dark Shadow.
As expected, everyone is after the first place team,
and Class A is in hot pursuit!
Everyone is got skills!
Those Class A guys are good.
With all those flashy moves, even just watching's fun!
There is this much difference just from their experience fighting villains!
Now, let us take a look at each team's points...
It is been seven minutes!
Here are the current rankings up on the screen!
Huh?
It is kind of...
What?
Wait a minute!
Other than Midoriya, Class A is not doing so well...
Bakugo?
What?
Class A is too simple-minded.
He got us!
What did you say, bastard?
Give that back!
I will kill you!
Since Midnight said it was the first game,
it would not make sense for them to cut a ton of people in the qualifier, right?
Assuming they would keep about forty people for the next stage,
we just made sure we stayed within that number as we ran,
observing from the back the Quirks and personalities of those who would be our rivals.
There is no point in being obsessive over winning in the prelims, right?
You did this as a class?
Well, it was not a consensus, but it was a good idea, right?
Hey, they are coming.
It is better than going after a temporary top
like a horse with a carrot waving in front of its face.
Oh, while I am at it, you are famous, are not you?
As the victim of the sludge incident!
Tell me about it sometime-
About how it feels to be attacked by villains once a year.
Kirishima... change of plan...
Before we get Deku,
let us kill all these guys!
Class B had a long-term strategy that involved throwing the qualifier, huh?
It is true that they could leave a stronger impression by overturning the mood
that favored Class A before the sports festival started.
But based on their way of thinking, it means they will not necessarily come after me.
Everyone, it will be easier to run aw-
Less than half the time is left now!
It will not be that easy, huh?
The cavalry battle is about to enter the second half!
In this unexpected rise of Class B,
who will wear the ten million points in the end?!
I will be taking that now.
Preview
I am Tenya Iida, the class representative of Class A,
and I am responsible for the preview.
L-Let us talk about the next episode, Iida.
I will challenge you!
That is the other extreme!
I will defeat your team in the cavalry battle
with a result that will not bring shame to the Tenya hero family
and like my older brother, Tensei, I will become an upstanding-
He is talking about himself after all, huh?
Next time, Cavalry Battle Finale!
Vroom, vroom sounds are coming from Iida's calves!
Go beyond!
Next time: Cavalry Battle Finale
Plus Ultra!
